channel.title: Hey! [DELTA]
channel.description: hey guys i was wondering.. Does anybody of you knows how to change the xp rate of skilling and combat and delta? i'd be very pleased. thanks

item.title: Hey! [DELTA]
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

[quote=“strucker, post:1, topic:429197”]hey guys i was wondering…
Does anybody of you knows how to change the xp rate of skilling and combat and delta?
i’d be very pleased.
thanks[/quote]

Well if it’s a global increase (ie. you want all experience gains to be doubled) then it’s simply matter of multiplying the experience in the addExp method.

If you want to change the rate for different things (x1.5 for fishing and mining, x3.0 for combat, etc) then you would need to find all calls to your addExp method and change the rate from there.

Read full topic
